participant_1.background:
I spend time with my grandson on Saturdays and read about pet training.
I want to use my passion for God to inspire others.
My first purchase was a pair of shoes to fit my growing feet.
i will graduate from college in two years.
i m a simple man.

participant_2.background:
I like to go golfing on sunny days with my friends because it is a fun and relaxing way to get some exercise.
I enjoy drawing comics for my grandchildren to enjoy.
I love the smell of fresh-cut flowers.
I am glad that my wife's cancer is in remission and that she is able to enjoy the outdoors with me.
i enjoy taking late night walks when its completely dark.

content.text: Hi there! I'm a simple man with a passion for God and I'm about to graduate from college.
Hi there! I'm glad you are excited to graduate from college. What's your major?
Thanks! I'm majoring in business administration.
That's great! What do you plan on doing after you graduate?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm considering going to graduate school.
That's a great idea! I'm sure you'll do great in whatever you decide to do.
Thank you! I appreciate the encouragement.
You're welcome! What are your hobbies?
I like to read, spend time with my grandson, and I'm a big fan of sports.
Those sound like great hobbies! I also enjoy reading and spending time with my grandchildren.
That's great! What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read a variety of books, but I especially enjoy historical fiction and mysteries.
Those are great genres! I also enjoy reading historical fiction and mysteries.
It's always nice to meet someone who enjoys the same things I do.
Agreed! It's nice to have someone to talk to about your interests.
It is! I hope we can stay in touch and talk more about our hobbies.
